## Quaternion.Dot() method

Returns the dot product (float) between the quaternions "left" and "right"

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static Dot(left: ReadOnlyQuaternion, right: ReadOnlyQuaternion): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  left | <code>ReadOnlyQuaternion</code> | defines the left operand |
|  right | <code>ReadOnlyQuaternion</code> | defines the right operand |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`

the dot product
